A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointing Lucasfilm. The biggest flaw The Last Jedi is that it underutilizes character potential and squanders what could’ve been an engaging story in favor of a dull new cast that we learn nothing about and long slow moving scenes that add nothing to film. The movie essentially has a lot in common with the prequel trilogy in the sense that it makes similar mistakes in its direction which is a shame.
